content:
$GNUS As we warned a month ago, the effectiveness filings like the one filed after hours yesterday allow shares from prior capital raises to be sold into the open market. 

Genius's financiers bought in for $0.21 months ago, and the latest filing allows 60 million new shares to flood the market. 

The latest Stan Lee deal was just a hyped up trap to lure in more gullible longs so Genius's financial backers could annihilate the bid with their new shares.

You got played by Heyward. And we warned exactly how this would play out step by step:

hindenburgresearch.com/geni...
@Ranger1717 yep check $VMD. People mostly care about our short calls but at the end of the day we are investors

$WINS Gap down to zero soon.

hindenburgresearch.com/losi... Bearish

$WINS Here we go again with another pump and dump on this China-based company with no financials, no CFO, with a parent in undisclosed insolvency, an operating entity with an undisclosed asset freeze, and with a delisting hearing in a week

hindenburgresearch.com/losi... Bearish

$UONEK $UONE insiders just dumped big time. Longs left holding the bag. 

sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data... Bearish

$GNUS Just an FYI, the last registration statement only registered about 60 million shares.

Warrants were registered, but the convertible notes have yet to be registered. 

We estimate another 70 million shares will therefore be in short order and will then become freely tradable for sale.

Last registration:
sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data...

Our article describing the rest of it:
hindenburgresearch.com/geni...

Good luck

$WINS New From US

Losing With Wins: NASDAQ’s Latest Disgrace Has No Financials, An Insolvent Parent Entity and Is Embroiled in What Appears to Be an Obvious Pump and Dump

hindenburgresearch.com/losi... Bearish
$GNUS Less than a week ago we warned about the implications of this notice of effectiveness

$GNUS is down 35% pre-market on the filing of an effectiveness notice that enables over 60 million shares purchased by its financiers at $0.21 to be sold freely to its unsuspecting retail holders.

This was the subject of our piece from a week ago.

Further downside ahead

hindenburgresearch.com/geni...

$WLL To some extent this fiasco is on the exchanges/regulators. New investors have no idea that bankrupt companies are worth zero/near zero because they still actively trade for quite a while.

Sad to see so many new people losing money hand over fist on something so obvious to anyone who has been in the market for a while. Bearish

$JFIN Pump and dump.

Welcome to China stocks Bearish
$WINS Welcome to what a pump and dump looks like Bearish

$WLL We presented the most optimistic case we could imagine of a price target of $0.60 per share. Equityholders will likely get somewhere between $0.17-$0.60

Welcome to the stock market Bearish

$HTZGQ The equity of Hertz is worth zero point zero per share.

Welcome to the stock market! Bearish
$GNUS weekend reading for everyone: hindenburgresearch.com/geni... Bearish

@Dmalik they registered 60 million shares to be sold that are currently ineligible for resale to the public. Before they can be sold the SEC must declare the S-3 effective which will take ~10 days.

When that happens, the new $GNUS  shares will likely flood the market and crush the stock, and unsuspecting longs here will have no idea what just happened to them.

There’s about 70 million more shares behind that to be sold as well. All were raised at $0.21 per share.

This is all obvious for any professional investor so we’re kind of watching in awe at the euphoria here in the meantime.

hindenburgresearch.com/geni...

$GNUS New from us: A Bagholder’s Guide to Why We Think Genius Brands Will Be a $1.50 Stock Within a Month

hindenburgresearch.com/geni... Bearish

twitter.com/hindenburgres/s...

Best of luck however it turns out Bearish

$SVM We are short Silvercorp and New Pacific Metals. $NUAG

Report: hindenburgresearch.com/new-...

Deck: hindenburgresearch.com/wp-c... Bearish

$AYTU the author of the NBC piece is a Pulitzer-prize winning journalist who confirmed directly with the manufacturer that it is halting exports of its tests due to the recent Chinese law.

Good luck with that bulls! I’m just here for the show Bearish

$AYTU this is the part of the scam where those with basic reading comprehension skills lose less money than those with none. 

AYTU’s manufacturer has halted all test exports, due to Chinese law. This thing is dead unless they get approval, and even if they do get it eventually (a big if) other approved manufacturers will be blowing past them in the meantime.

The CEO’s tweet about China permitting PPE (nothing to do with permitting shoddy tests) was misleading.

Best of luck to all Bearish

$GNW we’ve said since 2018 that Oceanwide was teetering on the brink. Now, finally, it acknowledges challenges relating to funding the transaction. We’re not surprised 

hindenburgresearch.com/genw...
$EMWPF "Why is the market up but Eros down?" Asks all the people that don't know what an ATM offering is. Bearish

$VMD We have been adding on the way up. We are typically known as short specialists but we also know a no-brainer long when we see one.

This company has a great balance sheet, strong organic growth, and is a pure-play on ventilator and respiratory therapy which is in critical demand right now. 

We see over 100% upside from these levels Bullish

$EMWPF The release of Eros's upcoming feature film Haathi Mere Saathi has been postponed "indefinitely" according to Indian media, due to concerns over COVID-19.

en.prothomalo.com/entertain... Bearish

@JeffreyCress We spent months on a deep-dive research effort on $BE: 

hindenburgresearch.com/bloo...

$BE As we said multiple times, we think Bloom is an obvious zero. Big miss, big guide down for March quarter, COVID is going to impact June quarter, and major debt maturities (~$350m) coming due into December.

We have a hard time imagining the company has any cash left by December let alone enough to meet maturities.

In the best case we see a massive dilution at low levels to buy time, but hard to imagine that will be enough. Bearish

$VMD We are long Viemed, a company that stands to benefit significantly from the Coronavirus outbreak given its vast inventory of ventilators and respiratory therapist network. 

The company has been completely overlooked (thus far) by investors searching for COVID-19 opportunities, has a conservative balance sheet, high ROIC, and was poised for growth before all this.

Now we expect growth to expand even faster.

viemed2018if.q4web.com/news... Bullish

$EMWPF $152.7 million in short term debt, $44 million in cash, consistently negative cash flow, declining revenue, key operating sub with a default rating, and box office sales are likely to drop off a cliff given Coronavirus concerns.

This is a pretty obvious one. Company's ATM offering just came online too and I expect they will need to hit it.

Good luck 'dip buyers'. Price target is near-term zero Bearish

$OPK We are short Opko, an obvious coronavirus pump. Its CEO Phil Frost has been accused by the SEC of engaging in pump and dump schemes in the past and the company's stock has spiked only on the back of a nonsense coronavirus PR last week.

sec.gov/litigation/litrelea... Bearish
@PullDownShorts they sued me for telling the truth and I won. Good luck. I expect the company will aggressively dilute and longs will lose everything. $EMWPF Bearish

$EMWPF huge miss, highly levered with tons of debt, cash dwindling and will likely be looking to hit its ATM equity offering ASAP.

Plus cinema revs will take a hit on coronavirus. This company is still a zero walking around pretending like it has a chance. Bearish

$SDC every bank is lowering their price targets this AM. Not us—still $2. Same as in October:

hindenburgresearch.com/smil... Bearish

$SRNEQ 17.3 million shares were just registered and are freely tradeable as of last Friday. 

Do you think this Coronavirus pump followed by an immediate dump was an accident?

5.5m shares of volume today. Lots of shares left to dump onto buyers who believe in these "anonymous" buyout bids and dreams of coronavirus cures.

100% downside stock

sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data... Bearish

$SRNEQ easy short. 

SEC prospectus went effective last Friday allowing 17.3 million new shares to be sold.

Now days later sellers dumping into coronavirus pump.

You all got played! Bearish

@Rumja $BE revenue's are down q/q and new revenues are way down. See Goldman note from last week.

Unrestricted cash is also way down because company keeps booking questionable 'revenue' then pledging cash for back-end liabilities. Ends poorly IMO. No surprise the CFO left. Bearish
$BE Company made clear intentions to raise capital on recent conference call. Nice pump/squeeze ahead of the raise. Good luck Bearish
$SDC Our latest investigation: SmileDirectClub – Moving Fast And Breaking Things In People’s Mouths – 85% Downside hindenburgresearch.com/smil... Bearish

@ChessHere I shorted $PTEIQ at $30 before the SEC investigation, and before the CFO was fired/charged with fraud by the SEC.

I also identified red flags relating to other key holders—Phil Frost, Barry Honig, et al, all of whom were subsequently charged with fraud. Bearish

$BE Our latest investigation—Bloom Energy: A “Clean” Energy Darling Wilting to its Demise
hindenburgresearch.com/bloo... Bearish
$YRIV Gonna miss all of you guys Bearish

$YRIV I’m not quite sure what you guys expect out of this court case. My report was dead-on accurate and has now been corroborated my multiple independent media outlets, and a plaintiffs class action firm. 

That’s all not to mention an independent investigation by FINRA/NASDAQ that culminated in a delisting over allegations of the company issuing false and misleading press releases and market manipulation.

Their lawsuit was clearly a harassment tactic to try to silence me and buy time. It didn’t work. 

No ‘books have been opened’ as a result either. The only lawsuit documents are the public ones, which mainly reiterate their own SEC filings and their legal position.

I have zero intention of settling anything.

Good luck Bearish
$YRIV still about $0.26 above my price target. Bearish

$YRIV For live updates on this company and others the best place to follow us is on twitter. Working on our next investigation as we speak

twitter.com/hindenburgres Bearish
